line.originaltext: 4 egg whites
1 1/4 cups white sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 teaspoon lemon juice
2 teaspoons cornstarch
1 pint heavy cream
6 kiwi, peeled and sliced
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
line.annotation: create_tool(t1, "baking sheet lined with parchment paper")

line.originaltext: Draw a 9 inch circle on the parchment paper.
line.annotation: set(t1,"draw a 9-inch circle on the paper")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry.
In a large bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry.

In a large bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing7,"Make sure they're stiff, but not dry")

line.originaltext: Gradually add in the sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, beating well after each addition.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing7}, ing8, "sugary egg whites", "add sugar 1 tablespoon at a time while beating")

line.originaltext: Beat until thick and glossy.
line.annotation: mix(ing8, t2, ing9, "thick and glossy sugary egg whites", "beat until thick and glossy")

line.originaltext: Overbeaten egg whites lose volume and deflate when folded into other ingredients.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing9,"Don't overbeat the eggs or it'll suck")

line.originaltext: Be absolutely sure not a particle of grease or egg yolk gets into the whites.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing9,"Don't get grease or yolks into that or it'll suck")

line.originaltext: Gently fold in vanilla extract, lemon juice and cornstarch.
line.annotation: combine({ing2, ing3, ing4, ing9}, ing10, "TGSEW, VE, LJ and CS", "in bowl")

line.originaltext: Gently fold in vanilla extract, lemon juice and cornstarch.
line.annotation: mix(ing10, t2, ing11, "some sort of egg white/corn starch dough", "gently fold")

line.originaltext: Spoon mixture inside the circle drawn on the parchment paper.
line.annotation: do(ing11, t1, ing12, "stuff on a baking sheet", "spoon mixture into the circle you drew")

line.originaltext: Working from the center, spread mixture toward the outside edge, building edge slightly.
line.annotation: do(ing12, t1, ing13, "circle of stuff with raised edges on baking sheet", "spread from center outward and build up an edge")

line.originaltext: This should leave a slight depression in the center.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing13,"If you properly raised the edges, the center should be relatively lower")

line.originaltext: Bake for 1 hour.
line.annotation: cook(ing13, t0, ing14, "Cooked dough-plates", "For one hour")
